🏠 Exciting Announcement! 🏠

I am delighted to introduce Elena Haviara, our new Chief Financial Officer here at Everty  

Elena brings a wealth of experience…
data.text:
📣 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬: Nicoletta Piera 𝐣𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐬 Everty 𝐚𝐬 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐟 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐫📣 We are excited to announce that Nicoletta Piera has joined Everty as our new 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐟 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐫 (𝐂𝐎𝐎)! Nicoletta brings over 𝟏𝟓 𝐲𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐝𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 to our team. She holds a law degree from the University of Cambridge and is a qualified chartered accountant with PwC London. Her career began in assurance and advisory across London and Cyprus, setting the stage for a remarkable journey. During Cyprus' emergence into the non-performing loans market, she transitioned to the banking sector, where she held key 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐱𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐞𝐬 in leading servicing companies. Most recently, she served as the COO of the Themis Group. Nicoletta is known for her 𝐠𝐨𝐚𝐥-𝐝𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐧 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐚𝐜𝐡 and her dedication to 𝐟𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩𝐬 within teams and organizations. Her blend of motivation and conscientiousness will be invaluable to Everty . Outside of work, she enjoys traveling and pursuing her passion for amateur photography. 🤗 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦, 𝐍𝐢𝐜𝐨𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐚! We look forward to achieving great things together: https://lnkd.in/dx49pGsK #WeAreEverty #EvertyTeam #Leadership #NewHire #COO #ExecutiveTeam #CorporateNews #BusinessGrowth #ProfessionalJourney #WelcomeAboard #ExcitingNews #OperationsLeader #WomenInLeadership #MeetTheTeam #RealEstate

📣 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬: Alberto Avramoff Aguilar 𝐣𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐚𝐬 Everty 𝐂𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐲 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫 – 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐢𝐧📣 We are thrilled to welcome Alberto Avramoff Aguilar to our Everty team as 𝐂𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐲 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫 for #Spain, bringing his expertise to drive our continued growth and innovation! A dynamic leader in the hospitality industry, Alberto Avramoff Aguilar has driven the expansion of OHAI, renowned for its eco-resorts emphasizing barefoot luxury and sustainability. Joining OHAI in 2023 as Director of Expansion, he used his extensive hospitality and M&A experience to foster growth. Alberto's career includes roles as Manager at PwC, consultant at Savills Aguirre Newman, and various positions at Starwood Hotels. He also served as Revenue Manager for Meliá's Mediterranean operations in Mallorca. Currently based in #Madrid, he is pursuing a 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 & 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦 at Cornell University and holds a master’s degree in 𝐑𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐮𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 from Universidad Rey Juan Carlos. 😃 Please join us in welcoming him to the team! 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐚𝐫𝐝, 𝐀𝐥𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐨! ➡ https://lnkd.in/dx49pGsK #WeAreEverty #EvertyTeam #NewHire #CountryManager #EvertySpain #WelcomeAlberto #HospitalityLeader #GrowthAndInnovation #Sustainability #RealEstate #ThrilledToHaveYou #LeadershipAnnouncement #WelcomeToEverty

🌊 𝐂𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐎𝐜𝐞𝐚𝐧 𝐃𝐚𝐲 🌊 On World Ocean Day, Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection recognizes the vital role our oceans play in sustaining life on Earth. From the air we breathe to the food we eat; the health of our oceans is intrinsically linked to our well-being. 🌎 As a 𝗴𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 hospitality brand with a 𝗱𝗲𝗲𝗽 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗻𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱, we believe in the importance of 𝗿𝗮𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 about the challenges facing our oceans and the need for 𝗰𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 to protect them. 💚 Let's celebrate the beauty and wonder of our oceans today and every day. Together, we can 𝗺𝗮𝗸𝗲 𝗮 𝗱𝗶𝗳𝗳𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 in preserving this precious resource for future generations. #ExploreAtWill #WorldOceanDay #SandglassExperiences #SustainableTravel #Ecotourism #ProtectOurOceans

🛥𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐚 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐭 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚 𝐢𝐧 𝐊𝐞𝐚, 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐜𝐞🏝 At Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection, we seek to find the perfect synergy between the 𝐚𝐝𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐬𝐨𝐮𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐫 𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐫𝐢𝐭. It is our goal to find the perfect balance. Our mission is to whisk you away to another world where you can indulge your sense of adventure and explore the local offerings. We provide that comfort of home so many seek while on holiday while offering this experience in 𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐚𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 set in the 𝐦𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐞𝐱𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 on the planet. That is why today we are so happy to have had the opportunity to have shared this with some of the most esteemed 𝐣𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬, 𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐚 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 in the country, allowing us to tell our story and share our hospitality at one of the two newly acquired properties in #Kea, #Greece, 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚. Today, we welcomed our 15+ guests with a promise, prepare to leave your day-to-day life behind and breathe in the feeling of peace and serenity of the most beautiful and remote corners of nature, living, breathing, and engaging with our 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝟓* 𝐡𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞. We happily ended the day with a very special “winning” experience where through an adventurous draw one of our very lucky guests 𝐰𝐨𝐧 𝐚 𝟐-𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐲 with the choice of any of our luxurious sandglass properties around the world, compliments of Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection. A heartfelt thank you to all the journalists, media and content creators who joined us today and a big thank you to our expert partner MINDHAUS, Tourism Marketing Strategy for making it all possible. 🛥 Stay tuned for more highlights from this incredible and unforgettable trip and #ExploreAtWill!! Discover 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚: https://lnkd.in/dcqfDgiN #SandglassExperiences #LuxuryHospitalityGreece #SandglassBoutiqueHotels #LuxuryTravel #GreeceTourism #KeaIsland

🌴 Everty 𝐚𝐜𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐰𝐨 𝟓-𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫 𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐜𝐞🌴 We are excited to announce our latest milestone in #LuxuryHospitality! Everty expands its international portfolio by acquiring 𝐭𝐰𝐨 𝟓-𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫 𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐬 (owned by Everty and operated by Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection) on the enchanting #Kea Island in the #Cyclades archipelago, #Greece. 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚 and 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐨 𝐊𝐞𝐚 𝐒𝐮𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚 are our newest gems that showcase our commitment to delivering first-class tourism experiences in prime locations. 𝐊𝐞𝐚 𝐈𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐝: 𝐋𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐫𝐲 𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐀𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐧𝐬 #Kea Island, known as the luxury 'suburb' of Athens, is easily accessible from Athens's airport. With beautiful sandy beaches, traditional settlements, and a rich history, it offers an authentic Greek island experience for both local and international visitors. 𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐬: 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐨 𝐊𝐞𝐚 𝐒𝐮𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚 𝐘𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚, next to Gialiskari beach with breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea, is designed for adults and couples. This brand-new hotel has 24 rooms and suites, exclusive pools, a spa, a bar, and more. 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐨 𝐊𝐞𝐚 𝐒𝐮𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐇𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐥 & 𝐒𝐩𝐚, located at the curving sandy beach of Korissia, is a family-oriented beachfront hotel with 38 spacious suites, featuring an outdoor pool, a kids’ pool, a beach bar, a complete on-site spa, and more. 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐤 𝐄𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐲 With Greek tourism being a key pillar of the country's economic growth, at Everty and Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection we reflect our consistent investment strategy in the country while fostering the local economy. Our portfolio in #Greece, includes two villas, four boutique hotels, three office buildings, and two logistics parks. In addition to these assets, Everty also owns and operates exclusive boutique hotels in unparalleled sites around the world, such as #CostaRica. 🌍 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐟𝐨 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐢𝐭: https://lnkd.in/dKzijTin #EvertyHospitality #SandglassExperiences #LuxuryHospitalityGreece #SandglassBoutiqueHotels #LuxuryTravel #GreeceTourism #RealEstateInvestment #KeaIsland

👥𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 Everty ’𝐬 𝐨𝐟𝐟-𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠🤝 Our teams from Everty and its hospitality division, Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection, across #Greece, #Bulgaria, #Spain, and #Costa Rica, recently came together for an unforgettable experience at our 𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐨𝐟𝐟-𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠. From April 19th to 22nd, they gathered at the breathtaking 𝐄𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐚 𝐆𝐮𝐥𝐟 𝐕𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐬 boutique hotel on the stunning island of #Crete for a productive and inspiring event. During this time, they had the opportunity to 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐢𝐧 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧, exchange valuable insights, and strengthen bonds as a team. Through engaging presentations and discussions covering key topics such as 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞, 𝐡𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲, they outlined our company’s vision, objectives, and future plans to bring Everty and Sandglass Hotels & Villas Collection to the next level. But it wasn't all business, as they also took time to enjoy the beautiful surroundings, indulge in delicious 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐤 𝐜𝐮𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞, and strengthen connections through engaging 𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦-𝐛𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬. From relaxing at the 𝐛𝐞𝐚𝐜𝐡 𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐛 to 𝐝𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 to traditional music, every moment was filled with laughter and a sense of unity. 🔜 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐮𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐢𝐧 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐨𝐟𝐟-𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠!
